name: Magnet Jack Demo
description:
This is a temporary Demo for the Kickstarter!!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/omulus/magnet-jack

Wishlist on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491800/Magnet_Jack/

The Discord - Feedback Welcome!

https://discord.gg/hVfHRxu

Magnet Jack is an action-oriented puzzle-platformer. It has a fast-changing assortment of wacky mechanics that will make you think and challenge your reflexes. Including a top-down overworld with off-the-wall themes and characters. Alright!
